name: Tank War (Himali Kothari)
description:
Tank War Battle of Metal!

Tank War is a thrilling twin-stick action shooter. The player is given a tank which has to be navigated through multiple levels and defend against several kinds of aggressive enemies. Enemies are equipped with different kinds of weapons and it is up to the player to choose the best strategy to stay alive. Tank War is an action-packed exciting game that will truly test the player’s gaming ability to perform under pressure.

Game Controls:

Keyboard:

W: Move forward

A: Rotate left

S: Move backward 

D: Rotate right

Mouse:

Left click: Regular bullet

Middle click: Rocket shot

Right click: Bounce bullet

Other developers: Edgar Moreno, Peter Revington, Mitkumar Malavia
